121131.content: Who is her opponent? Wonder Woman?
121131.title: Eating contest.

121131221.content: Do they have an eating contest?
121131221.title: Awesome!

choices: The girls tie, deciding on a burping and farting contest (Supergirl wins)
12113122111.content:
One day, Kara Danvers and Zee Zatara arrived at Sweet Justice. Diana, Karen, Babs and Jessica all had different affairs to take care of after school on that day.

"Hey, Zee-" Kara said as they sat down. "What?" Zee asked as she checked her reflection in her compact mirror. "Wanna have an eating contest?" offered Kara. Zee looked at her friend and fellow heroine in shock. "Why?" She asked. "So I can see if you can beat me in eating the most." Kara replied.

"Okay. I guess we can do that." Zee agreed as she waved a waitress over and put in a massive dessert order for the contest. The two girls smiled at each other as they waited for the order.

Soon, a massive array of desserts covered the table. Massive cakes, huge pies and big ice cream sundaes all awaited the two teenagers to eat them. Zee looked a little uneasy at doing this now that the desserts were in front of her.

"Scared?" Kara asked innocently upon seeing this expression on her friend's face while Kara tied a napkin around her neck. "No. I'm not scared, Kara. I'm merely wondering if this' a good idea." Zee replied. Then she took a deep breath. "Ready?" Kara asked.

"Ready." Zee said bravely. "On you mark... get set... GO!" Kara declared as the eating contest began. Quickly, she grabbed a large ice cream and began stuffing spoonful after large spoonful into it without taking a breath.

Zee, meanwhile, began eating a large pumpkin pie as fast as she could, while watching Kara's inhaling of the food. She couldn't believe how much Kara was able to put away.

As she licked the bowl her sundae had been in clean, Kara got an idea. "Say, Zee? How 'bout we do this in our superhero identities?" She suggested. Zee looked around carefully. They were the only ones there today due to everybody else mainly hanging out at the mall and other popular hangouts. "Okay." Zee decided as they ducked under the table and changed into Supergirl and Zantanna respectively.

"Okay. This' gonna be more interesting now." Supergirl smiled as she grabbed another large ice cream sundae and simply tossed it into her mouth from the bowl. Zee watched as Kara gobbled down two more sundaes like this before getting an idea.

Pulling out her wand, the teenage magician/heroine chanted a spell under her breath. The spell would both help increase her now starting to dwindle appetite and also have the food feed itself to her, allowing her to save her energy.

Just as Supergirl reached for the final sundae, it darted out of her reach and went to Zee. As Kara watched in shock, the massive banana split stopped in front of Zantanna and then flew into the magician's open mouth, smearing ice cream, hot fudge and whipped cream over her face.

"What? We said we could use our powers." Zee pointed with with a smile to Kara. Kara smirked upon hearing this. "Okay? You wanna play like that, we'll play like that." she said. Looking confused at first, Zee then caught on as Kara took a deep breath and, using her super breath, inhaled a 10 layer chocolate cake into her mouth whole, smearing crumbs and frosting on her face, cheeks bulging as she then swallowed whole.

Thinking quickly, Zee recast the spell on the food to feed both her and Kara, including the desserts about to be brought out by the waitress, who was watching in shock. A massive pecan pie then leapt into Kara's mouth after she brought it to her via super breath. Meanwhile, a marble sheet cake stuffed itself into Zee's mouth as an apple pie plowed into Supergirl's. Slowly but surely, the duo's trim and lean bellies began plump out, becoming softer and bigger as this massive gorge fest/eating contest continued.
12113122111.title: Sweet Justice

121211111111.content: taking into account Kara's kryptonian biology, batgirl got a pack of extra thick diapers. once Kara had come back into the room after removing her pants and panties and put on the diaper, Kara stood in front of her friends and...
121211111111.title: Thick diapers

choices: "Have me change your diaper for you?"
"Go out on a date with me?"
1212111111112.content:
With a few grunts and straining, Kara pushed a big load of poop into her thick diaper. As she felt the lumpy, sticky, smelly and huge mess against her butt, Kara felt something she'd never felt before.

She felt... happy to be wearing and using a diaper despite being a teenager. It felt so amazing to feel the poop rubbing against her butt and how heavy and full it made her diaper feel. Not to mention how lumpy and bulging it looked as a result of her massive dump.

"Um, Kara, are you okay?" asked Karen timidly as Kara just stood there, a big, goofy smile on her face. Kara quickly snapped out of it.

"Y-Y-Yeah, Kar! I-I-I'm just fine! Guess I really had to take a dump, huh?" Kara said quickly with a slight blush. Zantana, Karen, Jessica and Diana merely eyed each other but didn't say anything. Babs, meanwhile, was watching Supergirl with a smile on her face. She really did think Kara looked cute in her very full diaper.

The game continued on as Kara sat in her messy and bulgy diaper, occasionally shifting around in it to smear the poop on her butt even more, despite it starting to feel itchy after another hour.

Finally, the other girls went home, except for Babs. Kara was cleaning things up from their visit when she noticed Babs watching her, a queer expression on her face.

"Babs? You okay over there?" Kara asked with concern. Babs simply smiled and hugged Kara. "I just think you look cute in a very full diapee!" She giggled. Kara blushed even more now as she shifted slightly due to her butt itching even more now.

"Uh... thanks?" she finally said. Babs giggled again and then the duo were quiet for a moment. Finally, Babs spoke again.

"Hey, Kara?" "Hmmm?" Kara asked, looking up from where she'd been picking up the last few wrappers from the girls' snacks.

"Would you like to..."
1212111111112.title: pooped

choices: Babs and Kara decide to eat at Sweet Justice and then hang out at Kara's
After grabbing dinner at Sweet Justice, Kara and Babs go to the movies
12121111111122.content:
"...Go out with me?" Babs asked. "Okay." Kara shrugged. "Um, I mean... as a... y'know... date." Babs confessed. At that, Kara whirled to face her friend and fellow crimefighter.

"R-R-Really?" she stammered. "Yeah. I've kinda had a crush on you for the last few weeks now and today, seeing you in that beautiful, lumpy, stinky and poopy diaper really got my heart pumpin'." Babs confessed. Kara didn't say anything for a moment as she sat down, ignoring the squishing of her poop as she sat in it.

Finally, after a really long moment, Kara smiled. "Okay, Babs. I'll go out with you. How's tomorrow night sound?" She grinned.

Babs was so excited, Kara thought she was gonna need a diaper herself since it looked like Babs was gonna wet and/or poop herself from delight. "YEEEESSSSSSSS!!!! YES! Tomorrow night is awesome! Dad's outta town on a job thing for the next few months and he's actually willing to let me stay home alone!" She squealed as she threw her arms around Kara.

"Okay, okay! Babs, ya gotta calm down! Anymore excitement and I'm not gonna be the only one in a diaper." Kara joked as Babs took a few deep breaths to relax.

"Do you want me to change your diaper for you?" Babs asked sheepishly. Kara smiled gently. "I think I'll do this one tonight, Babs." she said as Babs pouted sadly.

"Don't worry," Kara smiled as she patted her bestie's shoulder. Then, she leaned in with a smile. "I'll let you smell my diaper tomorrow night after the date. If I eat enough, it'll be extra full, stinky and squishy." Kara whispered into Babs' ear, causing the girl to giggle in delight as Kara waddled into the bathroom to change.

The next day, Babs could hardly kept her head on straight during school. It was the final day before summer break and her date with Kara was that night at 5. They would plan on what to do after they met at Babs' house.

As the day dragged on, it seemed to Babs that Kara seemed just as distracted as she was. In study hall, she noticed Kara doodling a picture in her notebook. Craning her neck slightly, Babs noticed it was a very detailed picture of Kara and her holding hands in their superhero costumes while in flight (Kara clearly holding Babs' hand so she didn't fall). In history, Babs swore she saw Kara smiled goofily in her direction at least twice towards the end of the class.

At lunch the duo managed to keep their excitement hidden from Zantana, Jessica, Karen and Diana, though barely. Babs thought for sure when, in order to deny Jessica's offer to come over and watch a new movie after school, she revealed she and Kara had other things to do, causing Kara to nearly spit out her soda in surprise, though she managed to cover it up with a bad coughing spell.

Finally, finally, 5'o clock rolled around and Babs was waiting eagerly for Kara. A second later, the doorbell rang and sure enough, there was Kara. She wore her casual clothes, her navy blue jacket, brick red pants, boots and a blue t-shirt under her jacket, but now she also wore a diaper. Babs could tell due to how bulky Kara's pants looked on her butt.

Babs also wore her normal clothes. A purple hoodie with bat ears on the hood, black shorts, sneakers and backpack. For a moment, the two friends just smiled awkwardly at each other, then Kara spoke up.

"You, uh, look nice." she smiled shyly. Babs smiled. "Thanks. You look kinda cute too." she said. Kara smiled back and the two friends turned lovers headed out for their night on the town.

12323322213111.content: Where should this take place?
12323322213111.title: Eating Contest

choices: Suggests they compare bellies. The girls decide on a burping/farting contest.
123233222131111.content:
One afternoon, Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Zantanna and Batgirl were at Sweet Justice. Bumblebee had to stay after school to work on a science project while Jessica was attending a protest meeting against littering.

"So, what're we gonna do today?" Batgirl asked. "I do not know, Barbara. What would you like to do?" Diana replied. "How about an eatin' contest?" Kara offered with a sly smile. The other three looked at her in shock. "Why would we do that?" asked Zee, looking up from her compact mirror.

"'Cause I wanna see if you guys can eat as much as or more than me." Kara shrugged. Batgirl thought about it for a moment and then smiled. "I'm in." she said. "How 'bout you two?" Kara asked Zee and Diana. The two looked at each other thoughtfully. They both thought this may be a bad idea, but then, it could be interesting.

"I am in as well." Diana said. Zee merely nodded in agreement. With a smirk, Kara went up to the counter. "Hello, Kara. What can I do for you?" asked the woman who co-owned Sweet Justice. "My friends and I are havin' an eating contest. I just came to say keep piling on the desserts until we're all stuffed." Supergirl smiled. The woman seemed shocked but nodded and Supergirl went to the gang's booth.

Soon, cakes, pies and ice cream sundaes were all on the four's table. "I'm not sure about this." Zee whimpered slightly. "C'mon, Zee! It'll be okay." Barbara smiled. "On your mark... get set... GO!" shouted Kara a second later. With that, the four began the contest.

Kara quickly shoveled a whole pie into her mouth, her cheeks bulging as she chewed and then swallowed loudly with a big gulp before stuffing two more in.

Diana, meanwhile, was burying her face into a massive ice cream sundae, gobbling it down at a rapid speed, and getting ice cream all over her face and mouth.

Batgirl was stuffing herself with a large chocolate cake, using only her hands and mouth to eat it. After finishing it, she grabbed a vanilla cake and began inhaling that.

Zee, at the same time, was scarfing down some of the ice cream herself. As she did, she watched her friends carefully. It was clear that Kara and Diana were both big eaters, Diana due to her love for pretty much any dessert from the World of Man and Kara due to her metabolism. Babs, meanwhile, wasn't usually a huge eater but she was surprisingly keeping pace with the other two.

Slowly, the four's bellies began to bulge visibly as they kept eating round after round of desserts. Kara's was the first to start poking out from under her shirt. They were growing so much now, Kara actually had to stop for a second so she could loosen her belt and unbutton her pants to get more room. Diana soon followed by undoing her skirt and Babs soon did the same with her shorts.

Finally, the whole table was covered in debris from the eating contest. Plates, tins, trays, glasses and bowls covered it as did crumbs of pie and cakes as well as drops of ice cream. The four girls were all leaning back in the booth, moaning and groaning from the pig out, their bellies all swollen and pressing against the table.

"Sooo *Urp* freakin' stuffed, *hic* dude." Kara groaned, her face smeared with frosting, pie filling and ice cream as her tongue lolled out of her mouth while she panted heavily, her food stained hands rubbing her orb of a belly as it gurgled and rumbled.

"I... cannot... eat another... bite... sisters..." Diana moaned in equal discomfort as she rubbed her own giant tummy as it laid on the table, digesting all the desserts inside it.

"Who *belch* won... the *hic-urp* contest?" Babs groaned as she messaged her poor belly while hiccupping and burping painfully.

Zee...

info.brief_description: The DC super girls from both the webisodes and 2019 TV show end up fat and/or diapered.
info.description:
Here are the rules

*Only DC girls are allowed to be diapered and/or gain weight.

*Lesbian stuff is okay but don't go into extreme detail if you wish to let them make out.

*I will not allow immobility or male WG and diapering.

*Have fun.
info.pretty_title: DC Super Hero Girls WG and Diapered
